HTMLQuiz.question: Which of the following is the current HTML standard??
HTMLQuiz.explanation: The current standard for HTML is HTML5

HTMLQuiz.question: All HTML code must be nested within which of the following tags??
HTMLQuiz.explanation: All HTML code must be nested within a html tag

HTMLQuiz.question: The acronym HTML stands for which of the following?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: HTML stands for Hypertext Markup Language

HTMLQuiz.question: Multiple radio buttons in the same group can be set to a checked state at the same time
HTMLQuiz.explanation: Only one radio button in the same group can be in the checked state at a time

HTMLQuiz.question: Which tag represents a numbered list?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: ol stands for 'ordered list' which can be rendered as a numbered list

HTMLQuiz.question: Tables can be used to position text and images
HTMLQuiz.explanation: A table is a good way to organize text and images in different positions

HTMLQuiz.question: How many different heading elements does HTML support?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: HTML can support 6 different heading elements

HTMLQuiz.question: A text editor creates the HTML code for you as you add elements to the Web Page
HTMLQuiz.explanation: A text editor does not create the HTML code for you

HTMLQuiz.question: What are two components of HTML attributes?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: Name and Value are components of HTML attributes

HTMLQuiz.question: Which tag can be used to add a paragraph?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: p initiates a paragraph

HTMLQuiz.question: According to the W3C recommendation, what's the appropriate way of indenting nested HTML elements?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: The recommended way of indenting is 2 spaces

HTMLQuiz.question: video clips are unlikely to have a large file size
HTMLQuiz.explanation: Video files tend to be large in file size

HTMLQuiz.question: CSS considers every HTML5 element to be enclosed in a line
HTMLQuiz.explanation: CSS considers every HTML5 element to be enclosed in a box

HTMLQuiz.question: A family of styling specifications with a common name is called a:
HTMLQuiz.explanation: A family of styling specifications with a common name is called a Class

HTMLQuiz.question: The preferred way to specify a break that continues the text on the next line in a Web page is?
HTMLQuiz.explanation: br/ is the recommended way to specify a break

HTMLQuiz.question: To create a Web page with a list of HTML commands and their tags, it would be best use:
HTMLQuiz.explanation: A definition list the best way to create a web page with a list of HTML commands and their tags

HTMLQuiz.question: The tags used to specify table headings/column headings are:
HTMLQuiz.explanation: th is the tag used to specify table/column headings

HTMLQuiz.question: Microsoft Explorer is an example of an open source browser
HTMLQuiz.explanation: Firefox is an example of an open source

HTMLQuiz.question: Computer experts call spaces that have been inserted for readability
HTMLQuiz.explanation: Computer experts call spaces that have been inserted for readability: white space

HTMLQuiz.question: The width of a line of text on a Webpage is determined by the size of the text used
HTMLQuiz.explanation: The width of a line usually depends on the size of the browser window. It also depends on the screen resolution
